page.title: 16RIGID PAPER PRODUCTS,SELBY
page.content: {Rigid Paper}was founded in 1936. Then it was an old flax mill. Now it makes {rigid paper}for packaging. It is sold to many different factories in Britain and abroad.They make{boxes}and{tubes. They began with 5 paper machines but in 1969 they were dismantled. Now they have 3 machines, 2 working and 1 on stand by. The site covers 22 acres and 380 people are employed. They employ the most people in Selby.{Rigid Paper have 3 green mini buses, each holds 16 people and drives from Goole to Selby 6 times a day. The workers are trained in more than one department so they can operate more than one machine.To work there the only qualifications you need are experience and maths. The average wage for a machine operator is Â£165 before tax. The workers get an average of 5 weeks holiday a year.{ {Kerry, Rachel, Rosalind, Lorna
